text: The American Bar Association (ABA), founded August 21, 1878, is a federal American association for lawyers who practice law in the United States. It is also the accrediting body for all law schools in the United States. It is headquartered in Chicago, Illinois. == References == == Other websites == * Category:1870s establishments in Illinois Category:1878 establishments in the United States Category:Organizations based in Chicago Category:United States law
title: American Bar Association
